@yaroslavvb @byronyi
The training was going well. But i checked nvidia-smi(watch nvidia-smi), the Volatile GPU-Util was all taken by GPU:0(95% for GPU:0, while 0% for others).

I can set the batch_size to 512 when running a single GPU training. BUT an OOM exception was thrown when i running this 4 GPU training with batch_size of each set to 512. Seems to prove that all workers were using GPU:0 device
